title: 13 Last-Minute Halloween Decorations You Can Score on Amazon Prime
text: Halloween is quickly approaching (it's just 10 days away!), but if your home doesn't quite feel spooky enough for the holiday, we've got you covered. There are tons of cool and creepy decorations you can buy online to trick out your own haunted house, even last-minute. Whether you're decorating your porch for trick-or-treaters or throwing a big Halloween bash, these are all the Halloween decorations you need to really make it a hit. And since everything on this list is available on Amazon with Prime free one or two-day shipping, you'll still have plenty of time to deck out your space.
